verses.roman:
athāpi saṁvadiṣyāmo
bhavāny etena sādhunā
ayaṁ hi paramo lābho
nṛṇāṁ sādhu-samāgamaḥ

synonyms: atha api—nevertheless; saṁvadiṣyāmaḥ—we shall converse; bhavāni—my dear Bhavānī; etena—with this; sādhunā—pure devotee; ayam—this; hi—indeed; paramaḥ—the best; lābhaḥ—gain; nṛṇām—for men; sādhu-samāgamaḥ—the association of saintly devotees.
translation: Still, my dear Bhavānī, let us talk with this saintly personality. After all, association with saintly devotees is man's highest achievement.
